using System.Threading.Tasks;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.Formatting.Input
{
	public partial class NestedClasses
	{
		public async Task TestAsync()
		{
			await (new Nested().ReadAsync());
			await (new Nested2().ReadAsync());
			await (Nested3.ReadAsync());
		}

		partial class Nested
		{
			public Task ReadAsync()
			{
				return SimpleFile.ReadAsync();
			}
		}

		sealed partial class Nested2
		{
			public Task ReadAsync()
			{
				return SimpleFile.ReadAsync();
			}
		}

		static partial class Nested3
		{
			public static Task ReadAsync()
			{
				return SimpleFile.ReadAsync();
			}
		}
	}
